metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14824 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in the 'deref' plugin of 389-ds-base where it could use the 'search' permission to display attribute values. In some configurations, this could allow an authenticated attacker to view private attributes, such as password hashes.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-14824` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

389-ds - 1.4.2.4-1
389-ds-base - 1.4.2.4-1
389-ds-base-libs - 1.4.2.4-1
cockpit-389-ds - 1.4.2.4-1
python3-lib389 - 1.4.2.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.2.4-1').
